local_intent: Execute transfer to red plate: perceive red plate, move above, align, commit lower/contact placement, release and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already secured in gripper and grasp is stable
Red plate is reachable and approximately centered on table as seen in frame_04.jpg
Motion planners available for short cartesian moves and lowering
coherence_with_global: Subtree implements the GLOBAL_BT transfer phase: moves above red_plate, aligns, lowers until contact, places using place_pose, opens gripper, and retreats consistent with the high-level plan.
